Start time : 13/02/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 13/02/2025 21:26 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 13, 18:47 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Public Cloud offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 13/02/2025 18:00 UTC
Customers Impact : Customers are not able to create new instances in the local zone Vienna, but they have no impact on the instances that already exist.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA11][Public Cloud] - Instances maintenance notification
entry.content:
Jan 30, 09:20 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Thank you for your understanding.

Jan 30, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 27, 13:58 UTC
Update - Customer with running A10 instances are now able to migrate their instances using the instructions provided in direct communication sent on the 17th of January.

Jan 27, 09:17 UTC
Update - Workaround : During our preparation process for enabling customers to transition their workloads before maintenance, we are temporarily stopping the creation of A10 flavor based instances. If customers attempt to create new instances using any of the A10 flavors, they will receive an API message stating that the flavor is currently unavailable/ not found.

This change does not affect currently running instances, except for the inability to resize or upgrade a running instance to a higher flavor.

We will provide additional updates to inform customers when they can begin migrating their workloads, as previously communicated directly in tickets.

Jan 16, 22:04 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Public Cloud offer.

Start time : 30/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/01/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Please be advised that some instances in GRA11 will be unavailable for 1 to 5 hours during the maintenance.
Impacted customers will be sent direct communication (customer support tickets) for instructions about the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some instances in GRA11.

Thank you for your understanding.
